children.name: We do not collect detailed analytics or any personal identifiable information on this site. We may use TelemetryDeck to collect anonymized data from our apps. This data is completely private and does not contain personal identifiable information. We only use such information to diagnose problems and improve the services we offer.

Think Tap Work does not share personal information with other third parties nor do we store any information about you. If you send us an email, we won't share your address and it will stay in our inboxes until we archive it.

You have the right to request a copy of any of your personal data which are being used in any way by Think Tap Work. The easiest way to do this is to email us. As we do not collect or use your personal data in any way, we will send you a confirmation of that fact by email.
This privacy policy is subject to change without notice and was last updated on January 12th, 2023. If you have any questions feel free to contact us directly at info@thinktapwork.com.
